scripts-info.[environment]: Two environments: 'dev' or 'test'. Identical in functionality.
scripts-info.[environment]:server:debug: start server with hot-reload in debug mode (F5 to start debugging)
scripts-info.[environment]:server:production: compile code and start server in Docker container
scripts-info.[environment]:test: run all tests in watch mode
scripts-info.[environment]:test [test-suite-name]: run tests in watch mode matching test suite name
scripts-info.[environment]:test:production: run tests against server running in a Docker container
scripts-info.[environment]:migrations:run 0: run all downgrade migration scripts (results in empty database)
scripts-info.[environment]:migrations:run [target-ver: run migration scripts to targetted db schema version
scripts-info.[environment]:migrations:reset: run all downgrade migration scripts, then all upgrade migration scripts
scripts-info.[environment]:migrations:generate [migra: generate new migration based on differences in database and models
scripts-info.util:generate-index-export [target-folde: generate index.ts exporting all files within target folder
